basics.name: Xuan-You Lin
basics.summary: Iâ€™m a university student and the founder of K12EDU, an AI-powered education platform that makes learning fun and rewarding through digital games. I lead a cross-functional team and manage the entire development process. Thanks to the valuable feedback from supervising professors, lab seniors, and volunteer testers, our platform earned first place in the 2025 capstone project competition.
